pages.text:
Paddleboard for Rent
$30/per day (8am to 4pm) or
$180 per board for a weekly rental -weather pending -
There is a $100 hold on a credit card per board per day.
If you do a week it is a $250 hold.
Office House: 8am to 4 pm, weather permitting
Renters must be 21. Anyone under the age of 18 must be accompanied by an adult.
Paddleboards can be taken off-site if you have a way to transport them.
No delivery
Fun areas to explore? We recommend guests head north from our canal!
To learn more or make a reservation give us a call!
Bike, Kayak, and Paddleboard rentals are all
free
to our resort guests!
Call now

Captain Pips Marina & Hideaway
Step into the captivating history of Captain Pip’s Marina & Hideaway, once known as Bill Thompson’s Villas and Marina, alongside the iconic Porky’s. Back in the swinging '50s, this was THE place to be! Picture this: Ernest Hemingway, Jimmy Hoffa, Elizabeth Taylor, and Eddie Fisher making waves as regulars. And let's not forget the legendary antics—yes, they definitely 'Got Drunk Here!’
The founders of Captain Pip’s were two remarkable ladies, accompanied by their loyal canine companion, Pip. In a time when the idea of women owning and running such a business was unconventional, they frequently faced questions like, 'Where's the captain?' Their witty response? They'd humorously declare that Captain Pip was busily attending to matters around the property! This delightful anecdote adds to the charm of Captain Pip’s rich history.
2024 brings exciting news for Captain Pip’s — we're now under new ownership! Since taking the helm, we've been hard at work revitalizing our establishment. From renovating our rooms and property to sprucing up our boats and introducing a brand-new party boat, we're committed to enhancing your experience with us. But fear not — while we're upgrading our equipment, facilities, and website, we're keeping those cherished old-school vibes intact. Get ready for the same unforgettable atmosphere, now with even better amenities and guest experience!
Book Your Stay
Activities
